description: SAIL Display Components - Read-only display and visualization components

allDisplayFields.description: Parameters common to most display field components (excludes headingField, horizontalLine, messageBanner which have specialized parameter sets)

label.description: Text to display as the field label

labelPosition.description: Determines where the label appears. When set to COLLAPSED, the label is hidden and space is not reserved.

instructions.description: Supplemental text about this field (displayed below the component)

helpTooltip.description: Displays a help icon with the specified text as a tooltip (max 500 characters). Hidden when labelPosition is COLLAPSED.

showWhen.description: Determines whether the component is displayed on the interface. When false, the component is not evaluated.

accessibilityText.description: Additional text to be announced by screen readers. Used to provide context for users using assistive technology. Not displayed visually.

leftCenterRightAlignment.description: Alignment parameter using LEFT/CENTER/RIGHT values (used by richTextDisplayField, linkField)

align.description: Horizontal alignment of content within the component

startCenterEndAlignment.description: Alignment parameter using START/CENTER/END values (used by stampField, tagField, recordActionField, imageField, gaugeField)

align.description: Horizontal alignment of content within the component

colorWithTransparency.description: Color parameter that accepts enumerated values or hex colors with optional transparency

color.description: Color of the component. Accepts enumerated values or 6-digit hex (#RRGGBB) or 8-digit hex with transparency (#RRGGBBAA where AA is 00-FF)

value.validation: Can only contain a!richTextItem, a!richTextIcon, a!richTextBulletedList, a!richTextNumberedList, or plain text

tooltip.description: Text displayed on mouseover/tap of the rich text content

a!richTextDisplayField.description: Formatted text display with styles, links, lists

text.description: Text to display in the stamp (typically 1-2 characters for initials)

icon.description: Icon to display in the stamp (valid icon identifiers)

link.description: Link component to make the stamp clickable (accepts various link functions)

tooltip.description: Text displayed on mouseover/tap of the stamp

a!stampField.description: Icon and/or text on colored background

a!headingField.note: Does NOT inherit allDisplayFields - headings do not have label, instructions, helpTooltip, or accessibilityText

text.description: Text to display in the heading

headingTag.description: Accessibility heading tag for screen readers (produces no visible change)

link.description: Link component to make the heading clickable (if more than one link is provided, only the first will be used)

preventWrapping.description: When true, the heading will truncate to a single line

a!headingField.description: Styled heading text with accessibility support

tags.description: Array of tag items created with a!tagItem()

a!tagField.description: Colored text labels for highlighting attributes

links.description: Array of link components to display

a!linkField.description: Displays a list of clickable links

a!recordActionField.note: Does NOT inherit allDisplayFields - specialized component without label/instructions/helpTooltip
a!recordActionField.description: Displays record actions in various configurable styles

images.description: Array of document images or web images created with a!documentImage() or a!webImage()

isThumbnail.description: When true, clicking the image opens an enlarged view

a!imageField.description: Image display from documents or web

primaryText.description: Text to display in the center of the gauge

secondaryText.description: Text to display below the primaryText

tooltip.description: Text displayed on mouseover/tap of the gauge

steps.description: Array of text labels for each milestone step

active.description: Index of the currently active step (1-based)

links.description: Array of link components for each milestone step

a!horizontalLine.note: Does NOT inherit allDisplayFields - specialized component without label/instructions/helpTooltip/accessibilityText/showWhen

altText.description: Alternate text for screen readers; used as download link label on mobile

initialPageDisplay.description: Page number to display when the document opens (defaults to page 1)

highlightedText.description: Text to highlight in the document (first occurrence, case-insensitive; Chrome/Firefox only)

a!documentViewerField.description: Displays a document using the web browser's built-in document viewer

value.description: Time value to display (displays in user's timezone)

a!timeDisplay.description: Displays a single time (hour, minute, second) in read-only format

a!messageBanner.note: Does NOT inherit allDisplayFields - specialized component without label/instructions/helpTooltip

primaryText.description: Text to display on the first line inside the banner

secondaryText.description: Text to display beneath the primary text inside the banner

highlightColor.description: Color of the decorative bar and icon

icon.description: Valid Appian icon name (e.g., 'info-circle', 'check-circle'). Decorative only, not announced by screen readers.

showDecorativeBar.description: Controls visibility of the decorative bar

showWhen.description: When false, banner is not displayed or announced

announceBehavior.description: Controls screen reader announcement behavior. Note: Appian Mobile always uses DISPLAY_ONLY.

accessibilityText.description: Additional text announced by screen readers (not displayed visually)

a!messageBanner.description: Displays a message banner with configurable styling
